hero.intro: Currently looking for an internship to apply my skills and contribute to meaningful projects.

volunteer.title: Volunteer Work
volunteer.description: As a volunteer, I had the opportunity to teach introductory robotics to elementary school students, which allowed me to:
achievements: Enrich my scientific knowledge by using it in a different way.
Learn to adapt to children's questions and comments.
Give a more realistic and accessible image of the engineering profession.
